page.title: 03 Education in Lacock
page.content: { Lacock Primary School}was built in 1824. It takes children from the age of 5 to 11 yrs.they then transfer to a Comprehensive school in Chippenham. There are 85 pupils on roll and they are taught in three classes,a part-time teacher helps for 2 days a week and there is also a welfare assistant to help in the infants. . School begins at 9.00am and each day is begun with a school{assembly. Lessons cover a wide range of subjects such as creative writing, art and craft, music, games and of course English and maths. The school is lucky in having its own small swimming pool and the children all swim during the summer months. Mid-morning break is at 10.30 and dinner is at noon. A few children go home for dinner but most stay for{school meals}or sandwiches. School ends at 3.00pm.
